snippet.title: Spider-man: Edge of Time - Comic-Con 2011 Trailer (PS3, Xbox 360, Wii, 3DS, DS)
snippet.description:
Take a look at Spider-man: Edge of Time in this trailer from Comic-Con 2011.

For more Comic-Con 2011 coverage, check out: http://www.gamespot.com/6324530
